technique_name: 侧踢腿 Cè Ti Tuí (Side Stretch Kick)
deduction_content: 膝关节弯曲 - Knee/s bent at the apex of the kick
支撑腿脚踝离地 - Heel of supporting leg off the floor

questions.question: What is the error code for Cè Ti Tuí (Side Stretch Kick)?
What are the two main deduction points for Cè Ti Tuí (Side Stretch Kick)?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Knee/s are bent at the apex of the kick, and 2) Heel of supporting leg is off the floor.

questions.question: How should the supporting leg be positioned during a correct Cè Ti Tuí (Side Stretch Kick)?
questions.answer: The heel of the supporting leg should remain on the floor throughout the kick.
